001package net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.training.initializers;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.patterns.Strategy;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.Neuron;
005
006/**
007 * Implements an initializer that sets all parameters (weights and bias) to a given constant.
008 */
009@Strategy(Strategy.Role.CONCRETE)
010public class ConstantInitializer implements NeuralNetworkInitializer {
011
012    private final float constant;
013
014    /**
015     * Constructs a new initializer that sets all parameters to the given constant
016     *
017     * @param constant the value to initialize the parameters with
018     */
019    public ConstantInitializer(float constant) {
020        this.constant = constant;
021    }
022
023    /**
024     * {@inheritDoc}
025     */
026    @Override
027    public void initialize(Neuron neuron) {
028        for (int p = 0; p < neuron.getParameterCount(); p++) {
029            neuron.setParameter(p, constant);
030        }
031    }
032}
